statements: DELETE FROM fashion_trends WHERE description = 'Summer Collection';
DELETE FROM fashion_trends WHERE description LIKE '%summer%'
DELETE FROM FashionTrends WHERE trend_id = 2 AND trend_name = 'Summer Collection';
DELETE FROM fashion_trends WHERE trend_name = 'Summer Fashion';
DELETE FROM inspiration_boards WHERE trend_id IN (SELECT trend_id FROM fashion_trends WHERE trend_name='Summer Collection');
DELETE FROM editorial_content WHERE content LIKE '%important%';
DELETE FROM trends WHERE id = 1 AND image_url = 'example.jpg';
DELETE FROM editorial_content WHERE title = 'Summer Fashion';
